name: wiredoor
description: Wiredoor is a self-hosted WireGuard management panel that provides a web UI for configuring peers, networks, and access rules. It aims to simplify VPN orchestration and monitoring across multiple WireGuard endpoints.
features: Peer management: Add, edit, and remove WireGuard peers through an intuitive web interface.
QR code generation: Generate QR codes for mobile clients to quickly import VPN configurations.
Network visualization: View connected peers and their status in a centralized dashboard.
Access control: Define rules and permissions to control which peers can access specific resources.
Multi-server support: Manage multiple WireGuard servers from a single control panel.
Configuration export: Export peer configurations for manual deployment or backup purposes.
Connection monitoring: Track active connections and bandwidth usage per peer in real-time.
User authentication: Secure the management interface with user accounts and role-based access.
Automatic key generation: Generate public and private keys automatically when creating new peers.
IP address management: Assign and track IP addresses across your WireGuard network topology.
Audit logging: Record configuration changes and access events for security and compliance.
API access: Integrate with automation tools via REST API for programmatic peer management.
